Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.peptide.base

Class ChargeSetting

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.mfsim.model.peptide.base.ChargeSetting
  • public class ChargeSetting
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a charge setting of an amino acid. It contains informations about the pKs-value, de- / protonated particles, charges, charge type and helper methods.
    Author:
    Andreas Truszkowski

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChargeSetting

        public ChargeSetting​(ChargeType aType,
                     double aPKs,
                     java.lang.String aDeprotonatedParticle,
                     java.lang.String aProtonatedParticle,
                     java.lang.Character aCharge,
                     boolean anIsProtonatedCharged)
              throws DpdPeptideException
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        aType - Charge type (Terminal C/N, Sidechain free/bound).
        aPKs - pKs-value.
        aDeprotonatedParticle - Name of the deprotonated particle.
        aProtonatedParticle - Name of the protonated particle.
        aCharge - Charge.
        anIsProtonatedCharged - True if the protonated species is charged. False for the deprotonated species.
        Throws:
        DpdPeptideException - DpdPeptideException
